original: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: nakusalaḥ ca naakusalaḥ ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ
translated: Neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome thoughts are a condition, as a prior condition, for unwholesome thoughts.

original: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā naakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca na akusalaḥ ca dhammā na akusalassa dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ
translated: Neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome states are a condition, as a prior condition, for a wholesome state.🔽Neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome states are a condition, as a prior condition, for an unwholesome state.

original: …pe… nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena
analyzed: pe na kusalaḥ ca na akusalaḥ ca dhammā na kusalassa ca na akusalassa ca dhammassa purejāta paccayena
translated: … Neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome states are a condition, as a prior condition, for both a wholesome and an unwholesome state.

original: paccayo … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paccayaḥ cha saṅkhitta
translated: … (Abbreviated.)🔽As a cause, twenty-nine; as object, thirty-six; as predominance, thirty-five; as proximity, thirty-four;

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe chattiṁsa, adhipatiyā pañcatiṁsa, anantare catuttiṁsa,
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe chattisa adhipatiyā pañcatisa anantare catuttisa
translated: as contiguity, thirty-four; as repetition, twenty-nine; as dependence, twenty-four; as support, thirty-four;

original: samanantare catuttiṁsa, sahajāte ekūnatiṁsa, aññamaññe catuvīsa, nissaye catuttiṁsa,
analyzed: samanantare catuttisa sahajāte ekūnatisa aññamaññe catuvīsa nissaye catuttisa
translated: as dissociation, twenty-four; as association, twenty-four; as presence, twenty-four; as absence, twenty-four;

original: upanissaye chattiṁsa, purejāte aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte aṭṭhārasa, āsevane catuvīsa,🔽kamme ekūnatiṁsa, vipāke nava, āhāre ekūnatiṁsa …pe… sampayutte catuvīsa, vippayutte

translated: as disappearance, twenty-four; as non-disappearance, twenty-four; as a root, twenty-nine; as a result, nine; as nutriment, twenty-nine;

original: sattavīsa …pe… avigate catuttiṁsa.
analyzed: sattavīsa pe avigate catuttisa

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike pañhāvārassa anulomam pi paccanīyam pi anuloma paccanīyam pi paccanīya anulomam pi gaṇitam evam gaṇetabba
translated: (As in the case of the three profitable roots, the questions in the section on the unprofitable roots should be worked out in the same way as the questions in the section on the profitable roots, that is, by direct method, by reverse method, by direct and reverse method, and by method according to the terms. )
